title: E-Puck Path Planning with RRT
description: Autonomous robot navigation using Rapidly Exploring Random Trees.
text: Implemented RRT with 50% goal bias in Webots to enable goal-oriented navigation for the E-puck robot, using supervisor and controller scripts for path generation and replay.

title: MEMS Electron Microscope Simulation
description: Focusing simulation of an electron beam using an Einzel lens in a miniaturized TEM.
text: Simulated focusing effects of an Einzel Lens for a MEMS-scale electron microscope in COMSOL, analyzing beta emittance and 1-RMS beam quality.

title: Lagrangian Analysis of IC Engine
description: Dynamic modeling of a 4-stroke IC engine using Lagrange’s equations.
text: Performed a comprehensive dynamic analysis of piston, crank, and connecting rod motion using Lagrange’s equations to derive system equations of motion.

title: Quadrotor Dynamics with Wind Gusts
description: Trajectory control system design for quadrotors under wind disturbances.
text: Designed and implemented a PID and MPC-based control system for quadrotor drones in MATLAB Simulink, achieving 40% improvement in stability under gust conditions.

title: Pouch Cell Thermal Simulation
description: Heat conduction and convection analysis in lithium-ion pouch cells using Ansys and EChem models.
text: Thermal simulation of pouch cells under operational load to evaluate heat dissipation, aiding in improved battery pack design.

title: Ordnance Factory Medak| Ministry of Defence| Govt of India
description: Stress and deformation analysis of tubular chassis for load-bearing efficiency.
text: Simulated torsional and bending loads on a tubular chassis to assess structural integrity and optimize material layout.

title: Lotus Shark Steering Wheel Mechanism Analysis
description: Kinematic analysis of Lotus Shark-style steering to evaluate turning behavior and steering sensitivity.
text: Detailed mechanism analysis for the Lotus Shark steering wheel using linkage modeling, to understand its responsiveness and mechanical advantage.

title: Tubular Chassis Stress Analysis
description: Stress and deformation analysis of tubular chassis for load-bearing efficiency.
text: Simulated torsional and bending loads on a tubular chassis to assess structural integrity and optimize material layout.
